description.narrative: The goal of this program is to build the capacity of EHS Managers in the RMG sector to reduce the environmental footprint of Bangladeshi factories, enhance their competitive business advantage, and improve the overall health and safety of their workers and of the surrounding communities. Together, these impacts will support an increase in the number and quality of economic opportunities available to Bangladeshis.

Organisationen Institute for Sustainable Communities kommer att etablera en utbildning för arbetsledare inom textilindustrin i miljö, hälso och säkerhetsrelaterade frågor. Ett samarbete kommer att inledas med en bangladeshisk institution, som på lång sikt kommer att ansvara för utbildningen. Insatsen kommer att samfinansieras tillsammans med näringslivsaktörer under 2013-2016.

The organisation Institute for Sustainable Communities will establish an institutionalised training for middle managers within the textile industry in Bangladesh together with a Bangladesh institution. The projecti will be co-funded by private actors and will be implemented during 2013-2016. The Bangladesh institution will be selected by approval from Sida.
